integration_removed.description:
The Oncue integration has been removed from Home Assistant.

The Oncue service has been discontinued and [Rehlko]({rehlko}) is the integration to keep using it.

To resolve this issue, please remove the (now defunct) integration entries from your Home Assistant setup. [Click here to see your existing Oncue integration entries]({entries}).
integration_removed.title: The Oncue integration has been removed
